name: ArchIDE
tagline: A tiny utility to create, edit and upload your AUR packages.
body:
### What is ArchIDE?
ArchIDE is a tool to automatically generate, edit and upload AUR packages. Currently ArchIDE is in Pre-alpha version, but I can already list some of its main functionalities:

-clone empty/non-empty repositories from AUR;

-create .install files for your packages;

-use AUR tools like gem2arch to generate, review and upload packages;

-more are coming ...

### Further information
ArchIDE is entirely written in Java8. The source code can be found here:
<https://github.com/christopherloen/ArchIDE.git>


### Installation instructions
ArchIDE is designed to work on ArchLinux, and of course your computer has to be ready to contribute to AUR.
If you have problems while configuring your computer you can follow this wiki: <https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Arch_User_Repository#Submitting_packages>

### Support or Contact
You can contact me at christopherloen@gmail.com for anything you need to know about ArchIDE.
You can also find me at #archlinux channel on Freenode, my nick is christopherloen .
